text: José Alencar Gomes da Silva (; 17 October 1931 – 29 March 2011), also known as José Alencar, the Strong, was a Brazilian businessman and politician. He served as the Vice President of Brazil from 2003 to 2010. Alencar died from kidney, stomach, and prostate cancer in São Paulo, São Paulo, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais Category:Vice presidents of Brazil
title: José Alencar
